document.full_text: driving to the restaurant and the beginning of our long-awaited summer season, i heard the phone ring. it was chef joe: "i don't want to alarm you, boss, but there's something wrong in the kitchen."
document.title: fire closes start-up restaurant
lines_and_colors: driving to the restaurant and the beginning of our long-awaited summer season, i heard the phone ring. it was chef joe: "i don't want to alarm you, boss, but there's something wrong in the kitchen."
